# llms.txt — Block Farm Editor

Block Farm Editor is an Umbraco package for building and managing block-based content.

## Canonical website
- https://blockfarmeditor.com/

## Primary documentation (Readme)
Use these pages as the canonical “how-to” sources.

- How To Use (Readme hub):
  - https://blockfarmeditor.com/readme/
  - Sections on the page:
    - Initial setup: https://blockfarmeditor.com/readme/#initial-setup
    - Backoffice setup: https://blockfarmeditor.com/readme/#backoffice-setup
    - Building your first block: https://blockfarmeditor.com/readme/#building-first-block
    - Defining custom block property configs: https://blockfarmeditor.com/readme/#defining-block-properties

- Layouts:
  - https://blockfarmeditor.com/readme/layouts/

- Bootstrap Row Block (example block using a block list data type):
  - https://blockfarmeditor.com/readme/bootstrap-row/

- Import / Export:
  - https://blockfarmeditor.com/readme/import-export/

## Company & support
- About: https://blockfarmeditor.com/about/
- Customer support contact: https://blockfarmeditor.com/about/contactus/

## Policies
- Terms & Conditions: https://blockfarmeditor.com/terms/conditions/
- Privacy Policy: https://blockfarmeditor.com/terms/privacy/

## Crawling / discovery helpers
- Sitemap: https://blockfarmeditor.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://blockfarmeditor.com/robots.txt

## Guidance
- Prefer the “Primary documentation (Readme)” URLs above for product/how-to questions.

Last updated: 2026-02-16
